title: Services for Alumni | Engineering Career Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: UIC College of Engineering Alumni may visit with advisors in the Engineering Career Center up to 3 years after graduation. College of Engineering Alumni have access to attend select UIC-sponsored career fairs and events, unless otherwise noted on the event description. College of Engineering Alumni can also utilize the resources found on this website 24 hours a day.
UIC College of Business Alumni should connect with the Business Career Center to learn about resources available to graduates from the College of Business.
UIC Liberal Arts and Sciences Alumni should connect with UIC's Career Services Office to learn about services available to graduates from the College of Liberal Arts and Sciences.
The School of Public Health has dedicated career services advisors and develops events for alumni.
Engineering Alumni and still have questions?  Schedule an advising appointment with a Career Advisor.

*This mental health clinic is part of the Psychology Department at UIC. OAPS serves the UIC community, including faculty, staff, and students, as well as those living or working in the greater Chicago area. OAPS offers therapy for adults, children, families, and couples – helping individuals make changes that will improve their relationships and personal functioning, and enhance their ability to deal with various life stressors, including career transition.
